sections.title: The Final Breath
sections.intent: Establish Artie's transition from a terminal patient to a confused player in a glitching world.
sections.end_condition: Artie opens his eyes in the Aethelgard starting zone and sees the first UI glitch.

sections.title: The 100% Solution
sections.intent: Introduce the core mechanic of the permanent 100% crit-rate glitch through combat.
sections.end_condition: Artie kills a tutorial mob with a massive overkill critical hit.

sections.title: Glass Cannon Problems
sections.intent: Reveal the downside of the glitch: the damage output destroys standard equipment.
sections.end_condition: Artie's starting dagger shatters into dust after a final critical strike.

sections.title: Finding the Loop
sections.intent: Artie discovers a way to repeat the tutorial quest to farm specific rewards.
sections.end_condition: Artie confirms the tutorial quest 'First Steps' has failed to flag as completed, allowing a restart.

sections.title: Gear Up
sections.intent: Artie exploits the loop until he acquires gear that can withstand his damage.
sections.end_condition: Artie equips the 'Indestructible Ironwood Blade' and prepares to leave the tutorial.

sections.title: System Ping
sections.intent: The System's automated security detects the gear and stat anomaly.
sections.end_condition: A System Sentinel manifests in the glade to investigate the anomaly.

sections.title: The Great Escape
sections.intent: Artie must navigate the starting zone while avoiding or distracting the high-level Sentinels.
sections.end_condition: Artie crosses the physical boundary of the tutorial zone into the open world.

sections.title: Into the Wilds
sections.intent: Artie seeks a place where the System's direct oversight is weaker.
sections.end_condition: Artie reaches the outskirts of the Grey Market, a known low-surveillance zone.

sections.title: Shadow Economy
sections.intent: Artie navigates the social and mechanical complexities of the underground market.
sections.end_condition: Artie gains entry to the 'Null-Sector' where the most dangerous exploiters hide.

sections.title: The Dev-Killers
sections.intent: Artie meets a group of players dedicated to breaking the game's rules.
sections.end_condition: Artie is accepted into the Dev-Killer hideout after demonstrating his glitch.

sections.title: The Masking Plan
sections.intent: The group identifies a legendary item that can hide Artie's signature from the System.
sections.end_condition: Artie identifies the Void-Stitch Cloak as his primary objective.

sections.title: Market Manipulation
sections.intent: Artie and the Dev-Killers use a currency glitch to crash the local economy.
sections.end_condition: The auction house prices for essential goods begin to spiral into hyper-inflation.

sections.title: The Big Short
sections.intent: Artie converts the chaos into enough gold to buy the legendary cloak.
sections.end_condition: Artie collects the massive gold payout from the market collapse.

sections.title: Buying Silence
sections.intent: Artie acquires the cloak just as the System's 'World Event' response triggers.
sections.end_condition: Artie equips the Void-Stitch Cloak and his System Threat level vanishes.

sections.title: The Correction
sections.intent: The System sends its ultimate enforcement unit to delete the glitched area.
sections.end_condition: The Correction Avatar descends from the sky and initiates the zone reset.

sections.title: Breaking the Boss
sections.intent: Artie uses his 100% crit rate and indestructible gear to fight a being of pure code.
sections.end_condition: Artie lands a final, glitch-boosted critical hit on the Avatar's core.

sections.title: Code Collapse
sections.intent: The defeat of the Avatar causes the local reality to begin unraveling.
sections.end_condition: The Correction Avatar dissolves into raw code fragments, leaving a hole in the world.

sections.title: The Tear in the World
sections.intent: Artie must find the exit before the zone is hard-reset and he is deleted.
sections.end_condition: Artie locates the code-tear in the center of the collapsing Grey Market.

sections.title: Beyond the Patch
sections.intent: Artie escapes the known world for the unmapped Beta Lands.
sections.end_condition: Artie steps through the tear into the Beta Lands as the server reboot begins.
